#!/usr/bin/env bash

#

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "\n${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "\n${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "\n${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

confirm_proceed() {
  log_info "Actions to be performed:"
  log_info "1. Add VS Code, RPM Fusion & Terra repos"
  log_info "2. Install core tools (fish, starship, btop, etc.)"
  log_info "3. Clone and apply dotfiles"
  log_info "4. Switch default shell to fish"
  log_info "5. Run system update and diagnostics"

  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) log_warn "Aborting."; exit 1 ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}


install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish starship fastfetch micro btop topgrade \
    tailscale ripgrep fd-find gh tealdeer rustup gdb || log_warn "Some packages failed"
  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

apply_dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull --ff-only || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi

  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.config/" "$HOME/.config/"
  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.local/"  "$HOME/.local/"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Running updates with topgrade"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"

  log_info "Displaying system summary"
  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"

  log_ok "Setup complete"
}

main() {
  confirm_proceed
  sudo -v
  add_repos
  install_tools
  apply_dotfiles
  set_fish
  finalize
}

main

#!/usr/bin/env bash

#

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "\n${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "\n${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "\n${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

confirm_proceed() {
  log_info "Actions to be performed:"
  log_info "1. Add VS Code, RPM Fusion & Terra repos"
  log_info "2. Install core tools (fish, starship, btop, etc.)"
  log_info "3. Clone and apply dotfiles"
  log_info "4. Switch default shell to fish"
  log_info "5. Run system update and diagnostics"

  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) log_warn "Aborting."; exit 1 ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

add_repos() {
  log_info "Adding repositories"
  arch="$(uname -m)"
  fedora_ver="$(rpm -E %fedora)"

  sudo rpm --import https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc
  sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/vscode.repo >/dev/null <<EOF
[visual-studio-code]
name=Visual Studio Code
baseurl=https://packages.microsoft.com/yumrepos/vscode
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc
EOF

  sudo dnf install -y \
    --repofrompath="rpmfusion-free,https://download1.rpmfusion.org/free/fedora/releases/${fedora_ver}/Everything/${arch}/os/" \
    --nogpgcheck rpmfusion-free-release \
    rpmfusion-nonfree-release || log_warn "RPM Fusion add failed"

  if [ ! -f /etc/nobara-release ]; then
    sudo dnf install -y \
      --repofrompath="terra,https://repos.fyralabs.com/terra${fedora_ver}" \
      --nogpgcheck terra-release || log_warn "Terra repo add failed"
  else
    log_warn "Skipping Terra on non-Fedora base"
  fi

  log_ok "Repositories configured"
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish starship fastfetch micro btop topgrade \
    tailscale ripgrep fd-find gh tealdeer rustup gdb || log_warn "Some packages failed"
  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

apply_dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull --ff-only || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi

  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.config/" "$HOME/.config/"
  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.local/"  "$HOME/.local/"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Running updates with topgrade"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"

  log_info "Displaying system summary"
  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"

  log_ok "Setup complete"
}

main() {
  confirm_proceed
  sudo -v
  add_repos
  install_tools
  apply_dotfiles
  set_fish
  finalize
}

name=Visual Studio Code
baseurl=https://packages.microsoft.com/yumrepos/vscode
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc
EOF

  sudo dnf install -y \
    --repofrompath="rpmfusion-free,https://download1.rpmfusion.org/free/fedora/releases/${fedora_ver}/Everything/${arch}/os/" \
    --nogpgcheck rpmfusion-free-release \
    rpmfusion-nonfree-release || log_warn "RPM Fusion add failed"

  if [ ! -f /etc/nobara-release ]; then
    sudo dnf install -y \
      --repofrompath="terra,https://repos.fyralabs.com/terra${fedora_ver}" \
      --nogpgcheck terra-release || log_warn "Terra repo add failed"
  else
    log_warn "Skipping Terra on non-Fedora base"
  fi

  log_ok "Repositories configured"
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish starship fastfetch micro btop topgrade \
    tailscale ripgrep fd-find gh tealdeer rustup gdb || log_warn "Some packages failed"
  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

apply_dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull --ff-only || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi

  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.config/" "$HOME/.config/"
  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.local/"  "$HOME/.local/"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Running updates with topgrade"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"

  log_info "Displaying system summary"
  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"

  log_ok "Setup complete"
}

main() {
  confirm_proceed
  sudo -v
  add_repos
  install_tools
  apply_dotfiles
  set_fish
  finalize
}

main

#!/usr/bin/env bash

#

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "\n${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "\n${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "\n${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

confirm_proceed() {
  log_info "Actions to be performed:"
  log_info "1. Add VS Code, RPM Fusion & Terra repos"
  log_info "2. Install core tools (fish, starship, btop, etc.)"
  log_info "3. Clone and apply dotfiles"
  log_info "4. Switch default shell to fish"
  log_info "5. Run system update and diagnostics"

  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) log_warn "Aborting."; exit 1 ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}


install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish starship fastfetch micro btop topgrade \
    tailscale ripgrep fd-find gh tealdeer rustup gdb || log_warn "Some packages failed"
  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

apply_dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull --ff-only || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi

  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.config/" "$HOME/.config/"
  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.local/"  "$HOME/.local/"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Running updates with topgrade"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"

  log_info "Displaying system summary"
  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"

  log_ok "Setup complete"
}

main() {
  confirm_proceed
  sudo -v
  add_repos
  install_tools
  apply_dotfiles
  set_fish
  finalize
}

main

#

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "\n${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "\n${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "\n${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

confirm_proceed() {
  log_info "Actions to be performed:"
  log_info "1. Add VS Code, RPM Fusion & Terra repos"
  log_info "2. Install core tools (fish, starship, btop, etc.)"
  log_info "3. Clone and apply dotfiles"
  log_info "4. Switch default shell to fish"
  log_info "5. Run system update and diagnostics"

  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) log_warn "Aborting."; exit 1 ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y
    \ fish 
    \ starship 
    \ fastfetch micro btop topgrade
    \ tailscale ripgrep fd-find gh tealdeer rustup
    gdb
    \ || log_warn "Some packages failed"
  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

apply_dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull --ff-only || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi

  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.config/" "$HOME/.config/"
  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.local/"  "$HOME/.local/"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Running updates with topgrade"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"

  log_info "Displaying system summary"
  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"

  log_ok "Setup complete"
}

main() {
  confirm_proceed
  sudo -v
  add_repos
  install_tools
  apply_dotfiles
  set_fish
  finalize
}

main

#!/usr/bin/env bash

#

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "\n${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "\n${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "\n${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

confirm_proceed() {
  log_info "Actions to be performed:"
  log_info "1. Add VS Code, RPM Fusion & Terra repos"
  log_info "2. Install core tools (fish, starship, btop, etc.)"
  log_info "3. Clone and apply dotfiles"
  log_info "4. Switch default shell to fish"
  log_info "5. Run system update and diagnostics"

  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) log_warn "Aborting."; exit 1 ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

add_repos() {
  log_info "Adding repositories"
  arch="$(uname -m)"
  fedora_ver="$(rpm -E %fedora)"

  sudo rpm --import https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc
  sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/vscode.repo >/dev/null <<EOF
[visual-studio-code]
name=Visual Studio Code
baseurl=https://packages.microsoft.com/yumrepos/vscode
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc
EOF

  sudo dnf install -y \
    --repofrompath="rpmfusion-free,https://download1.rpmfusion.org/free/fedora/releases/${fedora_ver}/Everything/${arch}/os/" \
    --nogpgcheck rpmfusion-free-release \
    rpmfusion-nonfree-release || log_warn "RPM Fusion add failed"

  if [ ! -f /etc/nobara-release ]; then
    sudo dnf install -y \
      --repofrompath="terra,https://repos.fyralabs.com/terra${fedora_ver}" \
      --nogpgcheck terra-release || log_warn "Terra repo add failed"
  else
    log_warn "Skipping Terra on non-Fedora base"
  fi

  log_ok "Repositories configured"
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish starship fastfetch micro btop topgrade \
    tailscale ripgrep fd-find gh tealdeer rustup gdb || log_warn "Some packages failed"
  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

apply_dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull --ff-only || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi

  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.config/" "$HOME/.config/"
  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.local/"  "$HOME/.local/"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Running updates with topgrade"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"

  log_info "Displaying system summary"
  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"

  log_ok "Setup complete"
}

main() {
  confirm_proceed
  sudo -v
  add_repos
  install_tools
  apply_dotfiles
  set_fish
  finalize
}

#!/usr/bin/env bash

#

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "\n${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "\n${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "\n${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

confirm_proceed() {
  log_info "Actions to be performed:"
  log_info "1. Add VS Code, RPM Fusion & Terra repos"
  log_info "2. Install core tools (fish, starship, btop, etc.)"
  log_info "3. Clone and apply dotfiles"
  log_info "4. Switch default shell to fish"
  log_info "5. Run system update and diagnostics"

  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) log_warn "Aborting."; exit 1 ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}


install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish starship fastfetch micro btop topgrade \
    tailscale ripgrep fd-find gh tealdeer rustup gdb || log_warn "Some packages failed"
  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

apply_dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull --ff-only || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi

  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.config/" "$HOME/.config/"
  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.local/"  "$HOME/.local/"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Running updates with topgrade"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"

  log_info "Displaying system summary"
  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"

  log_ok "Setup complete"
}

main() {
  confirm_proceed
  sudo -v
  add_repos
  install_tools
  apply_dotfiles
  set_fish
  finalize
}

main

#!/usr/bin/env bash

#

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "\n${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "\n${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "\n${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

confirm_proceed() {
  log_info "Actions to be performed:"
  log_info "1. Add VS Code, RPM Fusion & Terra repos"
  log_info "2. Install core tools (fish, starship, btop, etc.)"
  log_info "3. Clone and apply dotfiles"
  log_info "4. Switch default shell to fish"
  log_info "5. Run system update and diagnostics"

  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) log_warn "Aborting."; exit 1 ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

add_repos() {
  log_info "Adding repositories"
  arch="$(uname -m)"
  fedora_ver="$(rpm -E %fedora)"

  sudo rpm --import https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc
  sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/vscode.repo >/dev/null <<EOF
[visual-studio-code]
name=Visual Studio Code
baseurl=https://packages.microsoft.com/yumrepos/vscode
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc
EOF

  sudo dnf install -y \
    --repofrompath="rpmfusion-free,https://download1.rpmfusion.org/free/fedora/releases/${fedora_ver}/Everything/${arch}/os/" \
    --nogpgcheck rpmfusion-free-release \
    rpmfusion-nonfree-release || log_warn "RPM Fusion add failed"

  if [ ! -f /etc/nobara-release ]; then
    sudo dnf install -y \
      --repofrompath="terra,https://repos.fyralabs.com/terra${fedora_ver}" \
      --nogpgcheck terra-release || log_warn "Terra repo add failed"
  else
    log_warn "Skipping Terra on non-Fedora base"
  fi

  log_ok "Repositories configured"
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish starship fastfetch micro btop topgrade \
    tailscale ripgrep fd-find gh tealdeer rustup gdb || log_warn "Some packages failed"
  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

apply_dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull --ff-only || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi

  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.config/" "$HOME/.config/"
  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.local/"  "$HOME/.local/"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Running updates with topgrade"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"

  log_info "Displaying system summary"
  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"

  log_ok "Setup complete"
}

main() {
  confirm_proceed
  sudo -v
  add_repos
  install_tools
  apply_dotfiles
  set_fish
  finalize
}

#

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"

#!/usr/bin/env bash

#

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "\n${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "\n${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "\n${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

confirm_proceed() {
  log_info "Actions to be performed:"
  log_info "1. Add VS Code, RPM Fusion & Terra repos"
  log_info "2. Install core tools (fish, starship, btop, etc.)"
  log_info "3. Clone and apply dotfiles"
  log_info "4. Switch default shell to fish"
  log_info "5. Run system update and diagnostics"

  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) log_warn "Aborting."; exit 1 ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}


install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish starship fastfetch micro btop topgrade \
    tailscale ripgrep fd-find gh tealdeer rustup gdb || log_warn "Some packages failed"
  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

apply_dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull --ff-only || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi

  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.config/" "$HOME/.config/"
  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.local/"  "$HOME/.local/"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Running updates with topgrade"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"

  log_info "Displaying system summary"
  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"

  log_ok "Setup complete"
}

main() {
  confirm_proceed
  sudo -v
  add_repos
  install_tools
  apply_dotfiles
  set_fish
  finalize
}

main

#!/usr/bin/env bash

#

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "\n${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "\n${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "\n${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

confirm_proceed() {
  log_info "Actions to be performed:"
  log_info "1. Add VS Code, RPM Fusion & Terra repos"
  log_info "2. Install core tools (fish, starship, btop, etc.)"
  log_info "3. Clone and apply dotfiles"
  log_info "4. Switch default shell to fish"
  log_info "5. Run system update and diagnostics"

  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) log_warn "Aborting."; exit 1 ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

add_repos() {
  log_info "Adding repositories"
  arch="$(uname -m)"
  fedora_ver="$(rpm -E %fedora)"

  sudo rpm --import https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc
  sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/vscode.repo >/dev/null <<EOF
[visual-studio-code]
name=Visual Studio Code
baseurl=https://packages.microsoft.com/yumrepos/vscode
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc
EOF

  sudo dnf install -y \
    --repofrompath="rpmfusion-free,https://download1.rpmfusion.org/free/fedora/releases/${fedora_ver}/Everything/${arch}/os/" \
    --nogpgcheck rpmfusion-free-release \
    rpmfusion-nonfree-release || log_warn "RPM Fusion add failed"

  if [ ! -f /etc/nobara-release ]; then
    sudo dnf install -y \
      --repofrompath="terra,https://repos.fyralabs.com/terra${fedora_ver}" \
      --nogpgcheck terra-release || log_warn "Terra repo add failed"
  else
    log_warn "Skipping Terra on non-Fedora base"
  fi

  log_ok "Repositories configured"
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish starship fastfetch micro btop topgrade \
    tailscale ripgrep fd-find gh tealdeer rustup gdb || log_warn "Some packages failed"
  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

apply_dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull --ff-only || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi

  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.config/" "$HOME/.config/"
  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.local/"  "$HOME/.local/"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Running updates with topgrade"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"

  log_info "Displaying system summary"
  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"

  log_ok "Setup complete"
}

main() {
  confirm_proceed
  sudo -v
  add_repos
  install_tools
  apply_dotfiles
  set_fish
  finalize
}

  printf "\n${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "\n${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "\n${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

confirm_proceed() {
  log_info "Actions to be performed:"
  log_info "1. Add VS Code, RPM Fusion & Terra repos"
  log_info "2. Install core tools (fish, starship, btop, etc.)"
  log_info "3. Clone and apply dotfiles"
  log_info "4. Switch default shell to fish"
  log_info "5. Run system update and diagnostics"

  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) log_warn "Aborting."; exit 1 ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

add_repos() {
  log_info "Adding repositories"
  arch="$(uname -m)"
  fedora_ver="$(rpm -E %fedora)"

  sudo rpm --import https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc
  sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/vscode.repo >/dev/null <<EOF
[visual-studio-code]
name=Visual Studio Code
baseurl=https://packages.microsoft.com/yumrepos/vscode
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc
EOF

  sudo dnf install -y \
    --repofrompath="rpmfusion-free,https://download1.rpmfusion.org/free/fedora/releases/${fedora_ver}/Everything/${arch}/os/" \
    --nogpgcheck rpmfusion-free-release \
    rpmfusion-nonfree-release || log_warn "RPM Fusion add failed"

  if [ ! -f /etc/nobara-release ]; then
    sudo dnf install -y \
      --repofrompath="terra,https://repos.fyralabs.com/terra${fedora_ver}" \
      --nogpgcheck terra-release || log_warn "Terra repo add failed"
  else
    log_warn "Skipping Terra on non-Fedora base"
  fi

  log_ok "Repositories configured"
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish starship fastfetch micro btop topgrade \
    tailscale ripgrep fd-find gh tealdeer rustup gdb || log_warn "Some packages failed"
  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

apply_dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull --ff-only || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi

  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.config/" "$HOME/.config/"
  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.local/"  "$HOME/.local/"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Running updates with topgrade"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"

  log_info "Displaying system summary"
  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"

  log_ok "Setup complete"
}

main() {
  confirm_proceed
  sudo -v
  add_repos
  install_tools
  apply_dotfiles
  set_fish
  finalize
}

main

}

confirm_proceed() {

  log_info "4. Switch default shell to fish"

  printf "\n${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "\n${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "\n${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

confirm_proceed() {
  log_info "Actions to be performed:"
  log_info "1. Add VS Code, RPM Fusion & Terra repos"
  log_info "2. Install core tools (fish, starship, btop, etc.)"
  log_info "3. Clone and apply dotfiles"
  log_info "4. Switch default shell to fish"
  log_info "5. Run system update and diagnostics"

  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) log_warn "Aborting."; exit 1 ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

add_repos() {
  log_info "Adding repositories"
  arch="$(uname -m)"
  fedora_ver="$(rpm -E %fedora)"

  sudo rpm --import https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc
  sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/vscode.repo >/dev/null <<EOF
[visual-studio-code]
name=Visual Studio Code
baseurl=https://packages.microsoft.com/yumrepos/vscode
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc
EOF

  sudo dnf install -y \
    --repofrompath="rpmfusion-free,https://download1.rpmfusion.org/free/fedora/releases/${fedora_ver}/Everything/${arch}/os/" \
    --nogpgcheck rpmfusion-free-release \
    rpmfusion-nonfree-release || log_warn "RPM Fusion add failed"

  if [ ! -f /etc/nobara-release ]; then
    sudo dnf install -y \
      --repofrompath="terra,https://repos.fyralabs.com/terra${fedora_ver}" \
      --nogpgcheck terra-release || log_warn "Terra repo add failed"
  else
    log_warn "Skipping Terra on non-Fedora base"
  fi

  log_ok "Repositories configured"
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish starship fastfetch micro btop topgrade \
    tailscale ripgrep fd-find gh tealdeer rustup gdb || log_warn "Some packages failed"
  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

apply_dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"

  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.local/"  "$HOME/.local/"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Running updates with topgrade"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"

  log_info "Displaying system summary"
  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"

  log_ok "Setup complete"
}

main() {
  confirm_proceed
  sudo -v
  add_repos
  install_tools
  apply_dotfiles
  set_fish
  finalize
}

    --nogpgcheck rpmfusion-free-release \

  if [ ! -f /etc/nobara-release ]; then

  else
    log_warn "Skipping Terra on non-Fedora base"
  fi

  log_ok "Repositories configured"
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish starship fastfetch micro btop topgrade \
    tailscale ripgrep fd-find gh tealdeer rustup gdb || log_warn "Some packages failed"
  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

apply_dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then

  else

  fi

  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.config/" "$HOME/.config/"
  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.local/"  "$HOME/.local/"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/bin/fish" ]; then

  else

  fi
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Running updates with topgrade"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"

  log_info "Displaying system summary"
  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"

  log_ok "Setup complete"

  apply_dotfiles

  finalize

#!/usr/bin/env bash

#

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "\n${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "\n${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "\n${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) log_warn "Aborting."; exit 1 ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

confirm_proceed() {
  log_info "Actions to be performed:"
  

  confirm || log_warn "Aborted"
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y
    \ fish
    \ starship
    \ fastfetch
    \ micro
    \ btop
    \ topgrade
    # \ tailscale
    \ ripgrep
    \ fd-find
    \ gh
    \ tealdeer
    \ gdb
    \ bat
    \ zoxide
    \ || log_warn "Some packages failed"
  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

download_dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi

  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/btop" "$HOME/.config/btop"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/btop" "$HOME/.config/btop"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Running updates with topgrade"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"

  log_info "Displaying system summary"
  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"

  log_ok "Setup complete"
}

main() {
  confirm_proceed
  sudo -v
  add_repos
  install_tools
  download_dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

#!/usr/bin/env bash

#

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "\n${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "\n${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "\n${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) false ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

confirm_proceed() {
  log_info "Actions to be performed:"


  confirm || log_warn "Aborted"
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y
    \ fish
    \ starship
    \ fastfetch
    \ micro
    \ btop
    \ topgrade
    # \ tailscale
    \ ripgrep
    \ fd-find
    \ gh
    \ tealdeer
    \ gdb
    \ bat
    \ zoxide
    \ || log_warn "Some packages failed"
  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

download_dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi

  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/btop" "$HOME/.config/btop"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/btop" "$HOME/.config/btop"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Update system?"
  confirm || log_warn ""
  log_info "Running updates with topgrade"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"

  log_info "Displaying system summary"
  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"

  log_ok "Setup complete"
}

main() {
  confirm_proceed
  sudo -v
  add_repos
  install_tools
  download_dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

#!/usr/bin/env bash

#

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "\n${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "\n${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "\n${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

confirm_proceed() {
  log_info "Actions to be performed:"
  log_info "1. Add VS Code, RPM Fusion & Terra repos"
  log_info "2. Install core tools (fish, starship, btop, etc.)"
  log_info "3. Clone and apply dotfiles"
  log_info "4. Switch default shell to fish"
  log_info "5. Run system update and diagnostics"

  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) log_warn "Aborting."; exit 1 ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

add_repos() {
  log_info "Adding repositories"
  arch="$(uname -m)"
  fedora_ver="$(rpm -E %fedora)"

  sudo rpm --import https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc
  sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/vscode.repo >/dev/null <<EOF
[visual-studio-code]
name=Visual Studio Code
baseurl=https://packages.microsoft.com/yumrepos/vscode
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc
EOF

  sudo dnf install -y \
    --repofrompath="rpmfusion-free,https://download1.rpmfusion.org/free/fedora/releases/${fedora_ver}/Everything/${arch}/os/" \
    --nogpgcheck rpmfusion-free-release \
    rpmfusion-nonfree-release || log_warn "RPM Fusion add failed"

  if [ ! -f /etc/nobara-release ]; then
    sudo dnf install -y \
      --repofrompath="terra,https://repos.fyralabs.com/terra${fedora_ver}" \
      --nogpgcheck terra-release || log_warn "Terra repo add failed"
  else
    log_warn "Skipping Terra on non-Fedora base"
  fi

  log_ok "Repositories configured"
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish starship fastfetch micro btop topgrade \
    tailscale ripgrep fd-find gh tealdeer rustup gdb || log_warn "Some packages failed"
  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

apply_dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull --ff-only || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi

  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.config/" "$HOME/.config/"
  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.local/"  "$HOME/.local/"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Running updates with topgrade"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"

  log_info "Displaying system summary"
  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"

  log_ok "Setup complete"
}

main() {
  confirm_proceed
  sudo -v
  add_repos
  install_tools
  apply_dotfiles
  set_fish
  finalize
}

main

recording.content:
#!/usr/bin/env bash

#

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "\n${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "\n${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "\n${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

confirm_proceed() {
  log_info "Actions to be performed:"
  log_info "1. Add VS Code, RPM Fusion & Terra repos"
  log_info "2. Install core tools (fish, starship, btop, etc.)"
  log_info "3. Clone and apply dotfiles"
  log_info "4. Switch default shell to fish"
  log_info "5. Run system update and diagnostics"

  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) log_warn "Aborting."; exit 1 ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y
    \ fish
    \ starship
    \ fastfetch
    \ micro
    \ btop
    \ topgrade
    # \ tailscale
    \ ripgrep
    \ fd-find
    \ gh
    \ tealdeer
    \ gdb
    \ bat
    \ e
    \ || log_warn "Some packages failed"
  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

apply_dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull --ff-only || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi

  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.config/" "$HOME/.config/"
  rsync -a --delete "$DOTDIR/.local/"  "$HOME/.local/"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Running updates with topgrade"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"

  log_info "Displaying system summary"
  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"

  log_ok "Setup complete"
}

main() {
  confirm_proceed
  sudo -v
  add_repos
  install_tools
  apply_dotfiles
  set_fish
  finalize
}

main

#!/usr/bin/env bash

# egirlcatscript
VERSION="0.1.0"

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "\n${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "\n${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "\n${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

}
confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) false ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y
    \ fish
    \ starship
    \ fastfetch
    \ micro
    \ btop
    \ topgrade
    # \ tailscale
    \ ripgrep
    \ fd-find
    \ gh
    \ tealdeer
    \ gdb
    \ bat
    \ zoxide
    \ || log_warn "Some packages failed"
  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

download_dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi

  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/btop" "$HOME/.config/btop"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/btop" "$HOME/.config/btop"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"
  confirm || log_warn "Aborted"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Finalizing setup"
  update
  log_ok "Setup complete"

  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"
}

main() {
  confirm || log_warn "Aborted"
  sudo -v
  install_tools
  download_dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

#!/usr/bin/env bash

# egirlcatscript
VERSION="0.1.0"

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

}
confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) false ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    \ tailscale #
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    \ || log_warn "Some packages failed"
  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

download_dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi

  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/btop" "$HOME/.config/btop"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/btop" "$HOME/.config/btop"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"
  confirm || log_warn "Aborted"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Finalizing setup"
  update
  log_ok "Setup complete"

  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"
}

main() {
  disclaimer
  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && exit 1)
  sudo -v
  install_tools
  download_dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

#!/usr/bin/env bash

# egirlcatscript
VERSION="0.1.0"

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

}
confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) false ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    tailscale
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    \ || log_warn "Some packages failed"
  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

download_dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi

  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/btop" "$HOME/.config/btop"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/btop" "$HOME/.config/btop"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"
  confirm || log_warn "Aborted"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Finalizing setup"
  update
  log_ok "Setup complete"

  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"
}

main() {
  disclaimer
  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && exit 1)
  sudo -v
  install_tools
  download_dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

#!/usr/bin/env bash

#

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "\n${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "\n${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "\n${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

confirm_proceed() {
  log_info "Actions to be performed:"
  log_info "1. Add VS Code, RPM Fusion & Terra repos"
  log_info "2. Install core tools (fish, starship, btop, etc.)"
  log_info "3. Clone and apply dotfiles"
  log_info "4. Switch default shell to fish"
  log_info "5. Run system update and diagnostics"

  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) log_warn "Aborting."; exit 1 ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y
    \ fish
    \ starship
    \ fastfetch
    \ micro
    \ btop
    \ topgrade
    # \ tailscale
    \ ripgrep
    \ fd-find
    \ gh
    \ tealdeer
    \ gdb
    \ bat
    \ zoxide
    \ || log_warn "Some packages failed"
  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

download_dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi

  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/btop" "$HOME/.config/btop"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/btop" "$HOME/.config/btop"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Running updates with topgrade"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"

  log_info "Displaying system summary"
  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"

  log_ok "Setup complete"
}

main() {
  confirm_proceed
  sudo -v
  add_repos
  install_tools
  apply_dotfiles
  set_fish
  finalize
}

main

#!/usr/bin/env bash

# egirlcatscript
VERSION="0.1.0"

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"

#!/usr/bin/env bash

#

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "\n${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "\n${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "\n${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

confirm_proceed() {
  log_info "Actions to be performed:"
  log_info "1. Add VS Code, RPM Fusion & Terra repos"
  log_info "2. Install core tools (fish, starship, btop, etc.)"
  log_info "3. Clone and apply dotfiles"
  log_info "4. Switch default shell to fish"
  log_info "5. Run system update and diagnostics"

  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) log_warn "Aborting."; exit 1 ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y
    \ fish
    \ starship
    \ fastfetch
    \ micro
    \ btop
    \ topgrade
    # \ tailscale
    \ ripgrep
    \ fd-find
    \ gh
    \ tealdeer
    \ gdb
    \ bat
    \ zoxide
    \ || log_warn "Some packages failed"
  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

download_dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi

  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/btop" "$HOME/.config/btop"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/btop" "$HOME/.config/btop"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Running updates with topgrade"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"

  log_info "Displaying system summary"
  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"

  log_ok "Setup complete"
}

main() {
  confirm_proceed
  sudo -v
  add_repos
  install_tools
  apply_dotfiles
  set_fish
  finalize
}

main

VERSION="0.1.0"

WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

}
confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) false ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"

  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"

#!/usr/bin/env bash

#

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "\n${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "\n${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "\n${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) false ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y
    \ fish
    \ starship
    \ fastfetch
    \ micro
    \ btop
    \ topgrade
    # \ tailscale
    \ ripgrep
    \ fd-find
    \ gh
    \ tealdeer
    \ gdb
    \ bat
    \ zoxide
    \ || log_warn "Some packages failed"
  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

download_dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi

  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/btop" "$HOME/.config/btop"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/btop" "$HOME/.config/btop"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"
  confirm || log_warn "Aborted"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Finalizing setup"
  update
  log_ok "Setup complete"

  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"
}

main() {
  confirm || log_warn "Aborted"
  sudo -v
  install_tools
  download_dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

#!/usr/bin/env bash

# egirlcatscript
VERSION="0.1.0"

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

  confirm 

}
confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) false ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Youtube Music" "$HOME/.config/Youtube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/btop" "$HOME/.config/btop"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"
  confirm || log_warn "Aborted"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Finalizing setup"
  update
  log_ok "Setup complete"

  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"
}

main() {
  disclaimer
  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && exit 1)
  sudo -v
  install_tools
  dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

#!/usr/bin/env bash

# egirlcatscript
VERSION="0.1.0"

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && exit 1)

}
confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) false ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/Youtube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/btop" "$HOME/.config/btop"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"
  confirm || log_warn "Aborted"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Finalizing setup"
  update
  log_ok "Setup complete"

  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"
}

main() {
  disclaimer

  sudo -v
  install_tools
  dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

documents.documentBeforeEdits:
#!/usr/bin/env bash

# egirlcatscript
VERSION="0.1.0"

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

  confirm 

}
confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) false ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Youtube Music" "$HOME/.config/Youtube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/btop" "$HOME/.config/btop"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"
  confirm || log_warn "Aborted"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Finalizing setup"
  update
  log_ok "Setup complete"

  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"
}

main() {
  disclaimer
  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && exit 1)
  sudo -v
  install_tools
  dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

#!/usr/bin/env bash

# egirlcatscript
VERSION="0.1.0"

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && exit 1)

}
confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) false ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"
  confirm || log_warn "Aborted" && return 0)
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Finalizing setup"
  update
  log_ok "Setup complete"

  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"
}

main() {
  disclaimer

  sudo -v
  install_tools
  dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

#!/usr/bin/env bash

# egirlcatscript
VERSION="0.1.0"

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

}
confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) false ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y
    \ fish
    \ starship
    \ fastfetch
    \ micro
    \ btop
    \ topgrade
    # \ tailscale
    \ ripgrep
    \ fd-find
    \ gh
    \ tealdeer
    \ gdb
    \ bat
    \ zoxide
    \ || log_warn "Some packages failed"
  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

download_dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi

  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/btop" "$HOME/.config/btop"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"
  cp -f "$DOTDIR/.config/btop" "$HOME/.config/btop"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"
  confirm || log_warn "Aborted"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Finalizing setup"
  update
  log_ok "Setup complete"

  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"
}

main() {
  disclaimer
  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && exit 1)
  sudo -v
  install_tools
  download_dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

#!/usr/bin/env bash

# egirlcatscript
VERSION="0.1.0"

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

  confirm 

}
confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) false ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Youtube Music" "$HOME/.config/Youtube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/btop" "$HOME/.config/btop"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"
  confirm || log_warn "Aborted"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Finalizing setup"
  update
  log_ok "Setup complete"

  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"
}

main() {
  disclaimer
  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && exit 1)
  sudo -v
  install_tools
  dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

}

dotfiles() {

  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  fi
}

install_tools() {

  sudo dnf install -y \

}

dotfiles() {

  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

set_fish() {

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && return 1)

}
confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) false ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"
  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && return 0)
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Finalizing setup"
  update
  log_ok "Setup complete"

  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"
}

main() {
  disclaimer || exit 1

  sudo -v
  install_tools
  dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main
