#!/usr/bin/env bash

# egirlcatscript
VERSION="0.1.0"

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && return 1)

}
confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) false ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"
  confirm || (log_warn "Not upgrading" && return)
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"
}

finalize() {
  update ||

  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"
}

main() {
  disclaimer || exit 1

  sudo -v
  install_tools
  dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

#!/usr/bin/env bash

# egirlcatscript
VERSION="0.1.0"

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

}
confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) false ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"
  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

download_dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Youtube Music" "$HOME/.config/Youtube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/btop" "$HOME/.config/btop"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"
  confirm || log_warn "Aborted"
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Finalizing setup"
  update
  log_ok "Setup complete"

  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"
}

main() {
  disclaimer
  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && exit 1)
  sudo -v
  install_tools
  download_dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && return 1)

}
confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "${response,,}" in
      y|yes) ;;
      *) false ;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"
  confirm || (log_warn "Not upgrading" && return)
  topgrade
}

finalize() {
  update || log_warn "Update failed"

  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"
}

main() {
  disclaimer || exit 1

  sudo -v
  install_tools
  dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

  if [ -t 0 ]; then

    esac
  else

    sleep 5
  fi
}

install_tools() {

  sudo dnf install -y \

    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \

    bat \

    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then

# egirlcatscript
VERSION="0.1.0"

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"

  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"

    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "$(echo "$response" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]')" in

    sleep 5
  fi

    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"
  confirm || (log_warn "Not upgrading" && return)

  topgrade || return 1
}

finalize() {
  update || log_warn "Update failed"

  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"
}

main() {
  disclaimer || exit 1

  sudo -v
  install_tools
  dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  mkdir -p "$HOME/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/YouTube\ Music" "$HOME/.config/YouTube\ Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"
  topgrade || return 1
  echo "a"
  topgrade || return 1
}

finalize() {
  update || log_warn "Update failed"

  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"
}

main() {
  disclaimer || exit 1

  sudo -v
  install_tools
  dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

#!/usr/bin/env bash

# egirlcatscript
VERSION="0.1.0"

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && return 1)

}

confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "$(echo "$response" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]')" in
      y|yes) true;;
      *) false
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"

  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/YouTube\ Music" "$HOME/.config/YouTube\ Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"

  confirm || (return 0
  topgrade || return 1
}

finalize() {

  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"
}

main() {
  disclaimer || exit 1

  sudo -v
  install_tools
  dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"
  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && return 0)
  topgrade || log_warn "Topgrade failed"
}

finalize() {
  log_info "Finalizing setup"
  update
  log_ok "Setup complete"

  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"
}

main() {
  disclaimer

  sudo -v
  install_tools
  dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

#!/usr/bin/env bash

# egirlcatscript
VERSION="0.1.0"

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && return 1)

}

confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "$(echo "$response" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]')" in
      y|yes) true;;
      *) false
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  mkdir -p "$HOME/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/YouTube\ Music" "$HOME/.config/YouTube\ Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"
  confirm || (return 0)
  topgrade || return 1
}

finalize() {
  update || log_warn "Update failed"

  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"
}

main() {
  disclaimer || exit 1

  sudo -v
  install_tools
  dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

#!/usr/bin/env bash

# egirlcatscript
VERSION="0.1.0"

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && return 1)

}

confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "$(echo "$response" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]')" in
      y|yes) return 0;;
      *) return 1;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
    return 0
  fi
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  mkdir -p "$HOME/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"
  confirm || (log_info "Not upgrading" && return 0)

  topgrade || return 1
}

finalize() {
  update || log_warn "Update failed"

  fastfetch || log_warn "Fastfetch failed"
}

main() {
  disclaimer || return 1

  sudo -v
  install_tools
  dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

documents.documentBeforeEdits:
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && return 1)

}

confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "$(echo "$response" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]')" in
      y|yes) return 0;;
      *) return 1;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
    return 0
  fi
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  mkdir -p "$HOME/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"
  confirm || () return 1


  topgrade || return 1
}

finalize() {
  update

  fastfetch
}

main() {
  disclaimer || return 1

  sudo -v
  install_tools
  dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"

  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"

}

  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && return 1)

}

confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "$(echo "$response" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]')" in
      y|yes) true;;
      *) false
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
  fi
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  mkdir -p "$HOME/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && return 1)

}

confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "$(echo "$response" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]')" in
      y|yes) return 0;;
      *) return 1;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
    return 0
  fi
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  mkdir -p "$HOME/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"

documents.documentBeforeEdits:
#!/usr/bin/env bash

# egirlcatscript
VERSION="0.1.0"

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && return 1)

}

confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "$(echo "$response" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]')" in
      y|yes) return 0;;
      *) return 1;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
    return 0
  fi
}


install_repos() {
  log_info "Setting up repositories"

  # RPM Fusion
  log_info "Enabling RPM Fusion repositories"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    https://download1.rpmfusion.org/free/fedora/rpmfusion-free-release-$(rpm -E %fedora).noarch.rpm \
    https://download1.rpmfusion.org/nonfree/fedora/rpmfusion-nonfree-release-$(rpm -E %fedora).noarch.rpm \
    || log_warn "Failed to enable RPM Fusion repositories"

  # VSCode
  log_info "Adding VSCode repository"
  sudo rpm --import https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc
  sudo sh -c 'echo -e "[code]\nname=Visual Studio Code\nbaseurl=https://packages.microsoft.com/yumrepos/vscode\nenabled=1\ngpgcheck=1\ngpgkey=https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc" > /etc/yum.repos.d/vscode.repo' \
    || log_warn "Failed to add VSCode repository"

  # Tailscale
  log_info "Adding Tailscale repository"
  sudo dnf config-manager --add-repo https://pkgs.tailscale.com/stable/fedora/tailscale.repo \
    || log_warn "Failed to add Tailscale repository"

  # Flathub && Flathub 
  log_info "Adding Flathub repository"
  flatpak remote-add --if-not-exists flathub https://flathub.org/repo/flathub.flatpakrepo \
    || log_warn "Failed to add Flathub repository"

  log_ok "Repositories set up"
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  mkdir -p "$HOME/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"

  if confirm; then
    topgrade
  else
    log_warn "Skipping system update"
  fi

}

finalize() {
  update

  fastfetch
}

main() {
  disclaimer || return 1

  sudo -v
  install_tools
  dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

#!/usr/bin/env bash

# egirlcatscript
VERSION="0.1.0"

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && return 1)

}

confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "$(echo "$response" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]')" in
      y|yes) return 0;;
      *) return 1;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
    return 0
  fi
}


install_repos() {
  log_info "Setting up repositories"

  # RPM Fusion
  log_info "Enabling RPM Fusion repositories"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    https://download1.rpmfusion.org/free/fedora/rpmfusion-free-release-$(rpm -E %fedora).noarch.rpm \
    https://download1.rpmfusion.org/nonfree/fedora/rpmfusion-nonfree-release-$(rpm -E %fedora).noarch.rpm \
    || log_warn "Failed to enable RPM Fusion repositories"

  # VSCode
  log_info "Adding VSCode repository"
  sudo rpm --import https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc
  sudo sh -c 'echo -e "[code]\nname=Visual Studio Code\nbaseurl=https://packages.microsoft.com/yumrepos/vscode\nenabled=1\ngpgcheck=1\ngpgkey=https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc" > /etc/yum.repos.d/vscode.repo' \
    || log_warn "Failed to add VSCode repository"

  # Tailscale
  log_info "Adding Tailscale repository"
  sudo dnf config-manager --add-repo https://pkgs.tailscale.com/stable/fedora/tailscale.repo \
    || log_warn "Failed to add Tailscale repository"

  # Flathub && Flathub Beta
  log_info "Adding Flathub && Flathub Beta repositories"
  flatpak remote-add --if-not-exists flathub https://flathub.org/repo/flathub.flatpakrepo \
    || log_warn "Failed to add Flathub repository"

  log_ok "Repositories set up"
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  mkdir -p "$HOME/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"

  if confirm; then
    topgrade
  else
    log_warn "Skipping system update"
  fi

}

finalize() {
  update

  fastfetch
}

main() {
  disclaimer || return 1

  sudo -v
  install_tools
  dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

documents.documentBeforeEdits:
#!/usr/bin/env bash

# egirlcatscript
VERSION="0.1.0"

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && return 1)

}

confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "$(echo "$response" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]')" in
      y|yes) return 0;;
      *) return 1;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
    return 0
  fi
}


install_repos() {
  log_info "Setting up repositories"

  # RPM Fusion
  log_info "Enabling RPM Fusion repositories"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    https://download1.rpmfusion.org/free/fedora/rpmfusion-free-release-$(rpm -E %fedora).noarch.rpm \
    https://download1.rpmfusion.org/nonfree/fedora/rpmfusion-nonfree-release-$(rpm -E %fedora).noarch.rpm \
    || log_warn "Failed to enable RPM Fusion repositories"

  # VSCode
  log_info "Adding VSCode repository"
  sudo rpm --import https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc
  sudo sh -c 'echo -e "[code]\nname=Visual Studio Code\nbaseurl=https://packages.microsoft.com/yumrepos/vscode\nenabled=1\ngpgcheck=1\ngpgkey=https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc" > /etc/yum.repos.d/vscode.repo' \
    || log_warn "Failed to add VSCode repository"

  # Tailscale
  log_info "Adding Tailscale repository"
  sudo dnf config-manager --add-repo https://pkgs.tailscale.com/stable/fedora/tailscale.repo \
    || log_warn "Failed to add Tailscale repository"

  # Flathub && Flathub 
  log_info "Adding Flathub repository"
  flatpak remote-add --if-not-exists flathub https://flathub.org/repo/flathub.flatpakrepo \
    || log_warn "Failed to add Flathub repository"

  log_ok "Repositories set up"
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  mkdir -p "$HOME/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"

  if confirm; then
    topgrade
  else
    log_warn "Skipping system update"
  fi

}

finalize() {
  update

  fastfetch
}

main() {
  disclaimer || return 1

  sudo -v
  install_tools
  dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

  sudo dnf install -y \

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then

    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"

#!/usr/bin/env bash

# egirlcatscript
VERSION="0.1.0"

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && return 1)

}

confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "$(echo "$response" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]')" in
      y|yes) return 0;;
      *) return 1;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
    return 0
  fi
}


install_repos() {
  log_info "Setting up repositories"

  # RPM Fusion
  log_info "Enabling RPM Fusion repositories"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    "https://download1.rpmfusion.org/free/fedora/rpmfusion-free-release-$(rpm -E %fedora).noarch.rpm \
    https://download1.rpmfusion.org/nonfree/fedora/rpmfusion-nonfree-release-$(rpm -E %fedora).noarch.rpm \
    || log_warn "Failed to enable RPM Fusion repositories"

  # VSCode
  log_info "Adding VSCode repository"
  sudo rpm --import https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc
  sudo sh -c 'echo -e "[code]\nname=Visual Studio Code\nbaseurl=https://packages.microsoft.com/yumrepos/vscode\nenabled=1\ngpgcheck=1\ngpgkey=https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc" > /etc/yum.repos.d/vscode.repo' \
    || log_warn "Failed to add VSCode repository"

  # Tailscale
  log_info "Adding Tailscale repository"
  sudo dnf config-manager --add-repo https://pkgs.tailscale.com/stable/fedora/tailscale.repo \
    || log_warn "Failed to add Tailscale repository"

  # Flathub && Flathub Beta
  log_info "Adding Flathub && Flathub Beta repositories"
  flatpak remote-add --if-not-exists flathub https://flathub.org/repo/flathub.flatpakrepo \
    || log_warn "Failed to add Flathub repository"
  flatpak remote-add --if-not-exists flathub-beta https://flathub.org/beta/repo/flathub.flatpakrepo \
    || log_warn "Failed to add Flathub Beta repository"

  log_ok "Repositories set up"
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  mkdir -p "$HOME/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"

  if confirm; then
    topgrade
  else
    log_warn "Skipping system update"
  fi

}

finalize() {
  update

  fastfetch
}

main() {
  disclaimer || return 1

  sudo -v
  install_tools
  dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

#!/usr/bin/env bash

# egirlcatscript
VERSION="0.1.0"

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && return 1)

}

confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "$(echo "$response" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]')" in
      y|yes) return 0;;
      *) return 1;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
    return 0
  fi
}


install_repos() {
  log_info "Setting up repositories"

  log_info "Enabling RPM Fusion repositories"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    https://mirrors.rpmfusion.org/free/fedora/rpmfusion-free-release-$(rpm -E %fedora).noarch.rpm \
    https://mirrors.rpmfusion.org/nonfree/fedora/rpmfusion-nonfree-release-$(rpm -E %fedora).noarch.rpm \
    || log_warn "Failed to enable RPM Fusion repositories"


install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  mkdir -p "$HOME/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"

  if confirm; then
    topgrade
  else
    log_warn "Skipping system update"
  fi

}

finalize() {
  update

  fastfetch
}

main() {
  disclaimer || return 1

  sudo -v

  install_repos
  install_tools
  dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

#!/usr/bin/env bash

# egirlcatscript
VERSION="0.1.0"

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && return 1)

}

confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "$(echo "$response" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]')" in
      y|yes) return 0;;
      *) return 1;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
    return 0
  fi
}


install_repos() {
  log_info "Setting up repositories"

  log_info "Enabling RPM Fusion repositories"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    "https://mirrors.rpmfusion.org/free/fedora/rpmfusion-free-release-$(rpm -E %fedora).noarch.rpm \
    "https://mirrors.rpmfusion.org/nonfree/fedora/rpmfusion-nonfree-release-$(rpm -E %fedora).noarch.rpm \
    || log_warn "Failed to enable RPM Fusion repositories"

}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  mkdir -p "$HOME/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"

  if confirm; then
    topgrade
  else
    log_warn "Skipping system update"
  fi

}

finalize() {
  update

  fastfetch
}

main() {
  disclaimer || return 1

  sudo -v

  install_repos
  install_tools
  dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

#!/usr/bin/env bash

# egirlcatscript
VERSION="0.1.0"

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && return 1)

}

confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "$(echo "$response" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]')" in
      y|yes) return 0;;
      *) return 1;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
    return 0
  fi
}


install_repos() {
  log_info "Setting up repositories"



  log_info "Enabling RPM Fusion repositories"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    "https://mirrors.rpmfusion.org/free/fedora/rpmfusion-free-release-$(rpm -E %fedora).noarch.rpm" \
    "https://mirrors.rpmfusion.org/nonfree/fedora/rpmfusion-nonfree-release-$(rpm -E %fedora).noarch.rpm" \
    || log_warn "Failed to enable RPM Fusion repositories"



}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  mkdir -p "$HOME/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"

  if confirm; then
    topgrade
  else
    log_warn "Skipping system update"
  fi

}

finalize() {
  update

  echo
  echo
  fastfetch
}

main() {
  disclaimer || return 1

  sudo -v

  install_repos
  install_tools

#!/usr/bin/env bash

# egirlcatscript
VERSION="0.1.0"

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && return 1)

}

confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "$(echo "$response" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]')" in
      y|yes) return 0;;
      *) return 1;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
    return 0
  fi
}


install_repos() {
  log_info "Setting up repositories"

  log_info "Enabling Terra repository"
  dnf install --nogpgcheck --repofrompath 'terra,https://repos.fyralabs.com/terra$releasever' terra-release

  log_info "Enabling RPM Fusion repositories"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    "https://mirrors.rpmfusion.org/free/fedora/rpmfusion-free-release-$(rpm -E %fedora).noarch.rpm" \
    "https://mirrors.rpmfusion.org/nonfree/fedora/rpmfusion-nonfree-release-$(rpm -E %fedora).noarch.rpm" \
    || log_warn "Failed to enable RPM Fusion repositories"



}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  mkdir -p "$HOME/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"

  if confirm; then
    topgrade
  else
    log_warn "Skipping system update"
  fi

}

finalize() {
  update

  echo
  echo
  fastfetch
}

main() {
  disclaimer || return 1

  sudo -v

  install_repos
  install_tools
  dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

documents.documentBeforeEdits:
#!/usr/bin/env bash

# egirlcatscript
VERSION="0.1.0"

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && return 1)

}

confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "$(echo "$response" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]')" in
      y|yes) return 0;;
      *) return 1;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
    return 0
  fi
}


install_repos() {
  log_info "Setting up repositories"

  log_info "Enabling Terra repository"
  sudo dnf install --nogpgcheck --repofrompath 'terra,https://repos.fyralabs.com/terra$releasever' terra-release || log_warn "Failed to enable Terra repository"

  log_info "Enabling RPM Fusion repositories"
  sudo dnf install --nogpgcheck --repofrompath 'rpmfusion-free,https://download1.rpmfusion.org/free/fedora/rpmfusion-free-release-$(rpm -E %fedora).noarch.rpm' \

  sudo dnf install --nogpgcheck --repofrompath 'rpmfusion-free,https://download1.rpmfusion.org/free/fedora/rpmfusion-free-release-$(rpm -E %fedora).noarch.rpm' \
  \
    rpmfusion-free-release rpmfusion-nonfree-release || log_warn "Failed to enable RPM Fusion repositories"


}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  mkdir -p "$HOME/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"

  if confirm; then
    topgrade
  else
    log_warn "Skipping system update"
  fi

}

finalize() {
  update

  echo
  echo
  fastfetch
}

main() {
  disclaimer || return 1

  sudo -v

  install_repos
  install_tools
  dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

#!/usr/bin/env bash

# egirlcatscript
VERSION="0.1.0"

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && return 1)

}

confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "$(echo "$response" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]')" in
      y|yes) return 0;;
      *) return 1;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
    return 0
  fi
}


install_repos() {
  log_info "Setting up repositories"

  log_info "Enabling Terra repository"
  sudo dnf install --nogpgcheck --repofrompath 'terra,https://repos.fyralabs.com/terra$releasever' terra-release || log_warn "Failed to enable Terra repository"

  log_info "Enabling RPM Fusion Free repositories"
  sudo dnf install --nogpgcheck --repofrompath 'rpmfusion-free,https://download1.rpmfusion.org/free/fedora/rpmfusion-free-release-$(rpm -E %fedora).noarch.rpm' \

  log_info "Enabling RPM Fusion repositories"
  sudo dnf install --nogpgcheck --repofrompath 'rpmfusion-free,https://download1.rpmfusion.org/free/fedora/rpmfusion-free-release-$(rpm -E %fedora).noarch.rpm' \
  \
    rpmfusion-free-release rpmfusion-nonfree-release || log_warn "Failed to enable RPM Fusion repositories"


}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  mkdir -p "$HOME/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"

  if confirm; then
    topgrade
  else
    log_warn "Skipping system update"
  fi

}

finalize() {
  update

  echo
  echo
  fastfetch
}

main() {
  disclaimer || return 1

  sudo -v

  install_repos
  install_tools
  dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "$(echo "$response" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]')" in
      y|yes) return 0;;
      *) return 1;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
    return 0
  fi
}


install_repos() {
  log_info "Setting up repositories"

  log_info "Enabling Terra repository"
  sudo dnf install --nogpgcheck --repofrompath 'terra,https://repos.fyralabs.com/terra$releasever' terra-release || log_warn "Failed to enable Terra repository"

  log_info "Enabling RPM Fusion Free repository"
  sudo dnf install --nogpgcheck --repofrompath 'rpmfusion-free,https://repos.rpmfusion.org/free$releasever' rpmfusion-free-release || log_warn "Failed to enable RPM Fusion Free repository"

  log_info "Enabling RPM Fusion Non-Free repository"
  sudo dnf install --nogpgcheck --repofrompath 'rpmfusion-nonfree,https://repos.rpmfusion.org/nonfree$releasever' rpmfusion-nonfree-release || log_warn "Failed to enable RPM Fusion Non-Free repository"
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  mkdir -p "$HOME/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"

  if confirm; then
    topgrade
  else
    log_warn "Skipping system update"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"

  if confirm; then
    topgrade
  else
    log_warn "Skipping system update"
  fi

}


finalize() {
  update

  echo
  echo
  fastfetch
}

main() {
  disclaimer || return 1

  sudo -v

  install_repos
  install_tools
  dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main
documents.documentAfterEditsNoShortening:
#!/usr/bin/env bash

# egirlcatscript
VERSION="0.1.0"

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && return 1)

}

confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "$(echo "$response" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]')" in
      y|yes) return 0;;
      *) return 1;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
    return 0
  fi
}


install_repos() {
  log_info "Setting up repositories"

  log_info "Enabling Terra repository"
  sudo dnf install --nogpgcheck --repofrompath 'terra,https://repos.fyralabs.com/terra$releasever' terra-release || log_warn "Failed to enable Terra repository"

  log_info "Enabling RPM Fusion Free repository"
  sudo dnf install --nogpgcheck --repofrompath 'rpmfusion-free,https://repos.rpmfusion.org/free$releasever' rpmfusion-free-release || log_warn "Failed to enable RPM Fusion Free repository"

  log_info "Enabling RPM Fusion Non-Free repository"
  sudo dnf install --nogpgcheck --repofrompath 'rpmfusion-nonfree,https://repos.rpmfusion.org/nonfree$releasever' rpmfusion-nonfree-release || log_warn "Failed to enable RPM Fusion Non-Free repository"
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  mkdir -p "$HOME/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"

  if confirm; then
    topgrade
  else
    log_warn "Skipping system update"
  fi
}

dconf() {
  log_info "Apply dconf?"

  if confirm; then
    topgrade
  else
    log_warn "Skipping system update"
  fi

}


finalize() {
  update

  echo
  echo
  fastfetch
}

main() {
  disclaimer || return 1

  sudo -v

  install_repos
  install_tools
  dotfiles
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

install_repos() {
  log_info "Setting up repositories"

  log_info "Enabling Terra repository"
  sudo dnf install --nogpgcheck --repofrompath 'terra,https://repos.fyralabs.com/terra$releasever' terra-release || log_warn "Failed to enable Terra repository"

  log_info "Enabling RPM Fusion Free repository"
  sudo dnf install --nogpgcheck --repofrompath 'rpmfusion-free,https://repos.rpmfusion.org/free$releasever' rpmfusion-free-release || log_warn "Failed to enable RPM Fusion Free repository"

  log_info "Enabling RPM Fusion Non-Free repository"
  sudo dnf install --nogpgcheck --repofrompath 'rpmfusion-nonfree,https://repos.rpmfusion.org/nonfree$releasever' rpmfusion-nonfree-release || log_warn "Failed to enable RPM Fusion Non-Free repository"
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  mkdir -p "$HOME/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"

  if confirm; then
    topgrade
  else
    log_warn "Skipping system update"
  fi
}

dconf() {
  log_info "Apply dconf?"

  if confirm; then
    dconf load / < "$DOTDIR/.config/dconf-backup.ini"
  else
    log_warn "Skipping dconf"
  fi
}

gnome-gnome-extensions() {
  
}


finalize() {
  update

  echo
  echo
  fastfetch
}

main() {
  disclaimer || return 1

  sudo -v

  dotfiles
  install_repos
  install_tools
  dconf
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main

#!/usr/bin/env bash

# egirlcatscript
VERSION="0.1.0"

set -euo pipefail

INFO_COLOR="\033[0;34m"
OK_COLOR="\033[0;32m"
WARN_COLOR="\033[1;33m"
RESET_COLOR="\033[0m"

log_info() {
  printf "${INFO_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_ok() {
  printf "${OK_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

log_warn() {
  printf "${WARN_COLOR}>>${RESET_COLOR} %s\n" "$1"
}

disclaimer() {
  log_info "egirlcatscript $VERSION"
  log_info "This script will install core tools and download dotfiles."

  confirm || (log_warn "Aborted" && return 1)

}

confirm() {
  if [ -t 0 ]; then
    read -rp "Proceed? [y/N]: " response
    case "$(echo "$response" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]')" in
      y|yes) return 0;;
      *) return 1;;
    esac
  else
    log_warn "Non-interactive shell detected. Continuing in 5s..."
    sleep 5
    return 0
  fi
}


install_repos() {
  log_info "Setting up repositories"

  log_info "Enabling Terra repository"
  sudo dnf install --nogpgcheck --repofrompath 'terra,https://repos.fyralabs.com/terra$releasever' terra-release || log_warn "Failed to enable Terra repository"

  log_info "Enabling RPM Fusion Free repository"
  sudo dnf install --nogpgcheck --repofrompath 'rpmfusion-free,https://repos.rpmfusion.org/free$releasever' rpmfusion-free-release || log_warn "Failed to enable RPM Fusion Free repository"

  log_info "Enabling RPM Fusion Non-Free repository"
  sudo dnf install --nogpgcheck --repofrompath 'rpmfusion-nonfree,https://repos.rpmfusion.org/nonfree$releasever' rpmfusion-nonfree-release || log_warn "Failed to enable RPM Fusion Non-Free repository"
}

install_tools() {
  log_info "Installing core tools"
  sudo dnf install -y \
    fish \
    starship \
    fastfetch \
    micro \
    btop \
    topgrade \
    ripgrep \
    fd-find \
    gh \
    tealdeer \
    gdb \
    bat \
    zoxide \
    || log_warn "Some packages failed"

  log_ok "Core tools installed"
}

dotfiles() {
  DOTDIR="$HOME/.dotfiles"
  log_info "Downloading dotfiles to \`$DOTDIR\`"

  if [ -d "$DOTDIR" ]; then
    git -C "$DOTDIR" pull -f || log_warn "Dotfiles update failed"
  else
    git clone https://github.com/egirlcatnip/dotfiles "$DOTDIR" || log_warn "Clone failed"
  fi


  log_info "Applying dotfiles"

  mkdir -p "$HOME/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.bashrc" "$HOME/.bashrc"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/Code" "$HOME/.config/Code"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fastfetch" "$HOME/.config/fastfetch"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/fish" "$HOME/.config/fish"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xkb" "$HOME/.config/xkb"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/xonsh" "$HOME/.config/xonsh"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/YouTube Music" "$HOME/.config/YouTube Music"

  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/starship.toml" "$HOME/.config/starship.toml"
  cp -f -r "$DOTDIR/.config/micro" "$HOME/.config/micro"

  log_ok "Dotfiles applied"
}

set_fish() {
  if [ "$SHELL" != "/usr/bin/fish" ]; then
    log_info "Changing default shell to fish"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish "$USER"
    sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/fish root
    log_ok "Default shell is now fish"
  else
    log_ok "Fish is already default shell"
  fi
}

update() {
  log_info "Update system?"

  if confirm; then
    topgrade
  else
    log_warn "Skipping system update"
  fi
}

dconf() {
  log_info "Apply dconf?"

  if confirm; then
    dconf load / < "$DOTDIR/.config/dconf-backup.ini"
  else
    log_warn "Skipping dconf"
  fi
}

gnome-gnome-extensions() {
  log_info "Installing gnome-extensions"

  if [ -d "$HOME/.local/share/gnome-shell/extensions" ]; then
    git -C "$HOME/.local/share/gnome-shell/extensions" pull -f || log_warn "Gnome extensions update failed"
  else
    git clone
}


finalize() {
  update

  echo
  echo
  fastfetch
}

main() {
  disclaimer || return 1

  sudo -v

  dotfiles
  install_repos
  install_tools
  dconf
  # set_fish
  finalize
}

main
